scenario.send: OPTIONS sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch][pid] From: sipp <sip:test@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] User-Agent: SBC-Killer CSeq: [field0] OPTIONS Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
